pullRequest.title: DDF-6000 Add additional logging with getting an AccessToken
pullRequest.bodyText:
What does this PR do?
When the status is not okay for getting access token, sanitize the password field before logging request and response information in trace logs.
Also, log if the password was being sent over encrypted, which it should not be.
Who is reviewing it?
@blen-desta
@ryeats
Select relevant component teams:
@codice/security
Ask 2 committers to review/merge the PR and tag them here.
@coyotesqrl
@stustison
What are the relevant tickets?
Fixes: #6000
Notes on Review Process

❓ (Question Mark) This comment is to gain a clearer understanding of design or code choices, clarification is required but action may not be necessary for approval.
❗ (Exclamation Mark) This comment is critical and requires clarification or action before approval.

nodes.bodyText: This warning is still a little bit unclear but i am not sure how to make it clearer that the password should not be encrypted at this point.

✏️ There should probably still be a DEBUG message about the failure to receive the token and this trace message and the sanitizeFormParameters call should all be wrapped in a conditional check if LOGGER.isTraceEnabled(). Otherwise, we're going to sanitize every time this occurs but almost never log it.
